definition: permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
extending all the way across/running all the way through
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
Mt Heng in Shanxi, northern mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]/Hengshan district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
Liu Heng, personal name of Han emperor Han Wendi 漢文帝|汉文帝/Liu Heng (1954-), Chinese writer
conservation (e.g. of energy, momentum or heat in physics)/to remain constant (of a number)
Li Heng, personal name of thirteenth Tang emperor Muzong 穆宗[Mu4 Zong1] (795-824), reigned 821-825
permanent tooth (as opposed to deciduous tooth 乳牙)/adult tooth

sentences.english: Large wine cellar with constant temperature and humidity, keeps the most original flavor and sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 恆溫恆溼大型酒窖，鎖住最原汁原味的情懷。

sentences.english: Even so, the car Interpol starts to ask again, gold constant or deny.
sentences.chinese: 即使這樣，車刑警再度詢問的時候，金度恆還是否認。

sentences.english: Should be opposite according to oneself the requirement of humidity, reasonable adjustment wet value of sparge quantity and constant.
sentences.chinese: 要根據自己對溼度的要求，合理調節噴霧量和恆溼值。

sentences.english: A constant humid environment is needed for this experiment.
sentences.chinese: 這個實驗要求恆溼的環境。

sentences.english: The cow cockies , as these farmers are known, own shares in Fonterra based on their milk production.
sentences.chinese: 這些奶牛場按照牛奶的產量持有恆天然公司的股份。

sentences.english: Fonterra should hae bypassed local officials and demanded a recall at a national le el.
sentences.chinese: 恆天然應該繞開當地官員在全國層面進行召回。
宇宙普適常數並非“恆”量？

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate canal configurations of mongolian permanent teeth.
sentences.chinese: 目的對蒙古族人恆牙根管形態進行研究。

sentences.english: For brittle material testing, the governing equation of input waveform for attaining constant strain-rate loading is given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了測試脆性材料時實現恆應變率加載的加載條件。

sentences.english: Through this ordeal Heng lay stiff and silent.
sentences.chinese: 在這個嚴酷的考驗中，恆一直僵硬地躺着，默不作聲。

sentences.english: While Alehin was telling his story，the rain left off and the sun came out.
sentences.chinese: 在阿列恆講述他的故事時，雨停了，太陽出來了。

sentences.english: Politics and historiography were always been dependent on each other and took advantage of each other in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代，政治與史學恆相依相賴，互爲利用。

sentences.english: We are a specialized present supplier.
sentences.chinese: 恆天裕盛是一家專業禮品供應商。

sentences.english: At constant temperature, that meant that pA star is bigger than pB star.
sentences.chinese: 溫度恆定時，這意味着pA星比pB星大。

sentences.english: EVERGRANDE CITY is located in Huanshi road, The total construction area of initial is 260,000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 恆大城位於環市西路，首期總建面積達26萬平方米。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the principle and structure of a TENS (Transcutaneous Electric Nerve Stimulation) apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種恆流型TENS治療儀的工作原理和結構。

definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
